attributes.action: Re-open the Airfield at St Athan for Civil Flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RAF Saint Athan is a large Royal Air Force station in the village of St Athan in the Vale of Glamorgan, southern Wales. It claims to be the largest RAF station. It is very active as a military station but I would really like to see it re-open for Civil Flying.
